title: Wheel of Existence
description:
(Exact Date Unknown)
The great wheel of existence came into accidental existence in a remote corner of oblivion. Tentacled creatures swim in the world-covering oceans while celestial aberrations swim between the stars.

title: The First War
description:
(Exact Date Unknown)
The First War between the aberrant beings of the Prime Material and the invading elemental gods.
The Aboleth of the seas flee in the earliest days of the war, hiding in a region known as the Endless Nadir.

Demon Gods, created as foot soldiers by these star entities, first fight for their masters and then rebel against them.

Graz’zt, one of the rebellious Demon Gods, is cast down from the beyond. His body plummets to earth, the impact reshaping the Flanaess and tearing rents in reality.

The first gods of the mortals rise, created to protect their believers from the carnage.

title: The Battle of Pesh
description:
(Exact Date Unknown)
The Battle of Pesh: the Wind Dukes of Aaqa, a god race of the Plane of Air, break the Rod of Law into seven obelisks that seal shut the tears created by the fall of Graz’zt. This turns the tide in favor of the elemental gods at the cost of making the Prime Material a relatively barren wasteland of possibility.

title: Stalemate
description:
(Exact Date Unknown)
The First War ends in a stalemate. The elemental gods withdraw to their homes. The Demon Gods and their legions flee to a newly created home in the outer planes. The celestial aberrations flee reality for the Far Realm beyond existence. The mortal gods are left in possession of the Prime Material by default, but they too eventually leave for the Outer Planes.

title: Corruption
description:
(Exact Date Unknown)
The Oeridian hero Stratis slew the ancient green dragon, Lethregal the Whisper of Despair. He used the dragon’s blood to create the Siren Stones at the small village that would become Saltmarsh. Stratis was elevated to demi-godhood by Stern Alia and fathered the god Hieroneoous.

An unknown Ur-Flan druid plunged a god-killing blade into the hand of the archfey Granny Nightshade. This act pierced into the Feywild and Shadowfell, allowing them to bleed into this world. This act corrupted the forest known as the Greatwood, turning it into the Dreadwood. Few know of this act, blaming the Dreadwood’s corruption on the slaying of Lethregal.

title: Empires Destroyed
description:
(Exact Date Unknown)
Twin Cataclysms: Suloise Empire and Baklunish Empire destroy each other.

Kymneraph and Thaendimilrax, twin blue dragons, are hatched from the same clutch due to the unleashed power of the Twin Cataclysms. When they rise to adulthood, they turn on each other. Kymneraph wins and spends the next several centuries attempting to resurrect her without her turning on him.

title: Iuz Defeated
description:
(Exact Date Unknown)
Iuz is defeated and wounded by the Seven Betrayers. He swears a God’s Oath to eradicate their entire lineage.

title: Greyhawk Falls
description:
Iuz sacks the Free City of Greyhawk. His army enters the dungeons of Castle Greyhawk; few return. Iuz is trapped in the Godtrap. Zagyg becomes a demigod.

One of Zagyg’s last actions before ascending is casting out Kymneraph, who was spying on Zagyg as he construction the Godtrap.

title: Kymneraph in the Valley
description:
(Exact Date Unknown)
Kymneraph establishes himself in the Valley of the Mage. He begins the long, slow process of using the obelisk on Celene to transform himself into a different type of dragon.

title: Suversion
description:
(Exact Date Unknown)
Syrgaul the Lendorian, a former agent of Kymneraph, attempts to subvert his pact with the Chained Oblivion. He fails and is dragged below the waters and transformed. His ship, the Tammeraut, is destroyed and the Scarlet Brotherhood recovers the Grimoire of the Deep.

title: Turtleback Agatha Trapped
description:
(Exact Date Unknown)
Anthala Quen traps Turtleback Agatha in Saltcrest, and establishes the Sea Grove in Saltmarsh.

title: The Hateful Wars Begin
description: The Hateful Wars begin. Antha Quen answers Reyna Yargrove’s summons and fights the war of genocide on her behalf.

title: Anthala Quen Exits
description: Anthala Queen leaves the Hateful Wars. He rejects Reyna Yargrove’s authority, travelling the world.

title: The Plunder of Castle Greyhawk
description:
Fireseek 2 – 13
The Plunder of Castle Greyhawk: Riggby and Robilar venture into the depths to release Iuz from the Godtrap so that they could kill him.
Tenser and Bigby follow them in to stop it. The Nine Shards of Iuz is released and there is a three-way battle between Tenser & Bigby, Robilar & Riggby, and the semi-reformed Iuz.
Bigby’s soul is snuffed out by Riggby. His body is occupied by a Shard of Iuz.

title: The First Circle of Eight
description:
(Exact Date Unknown)
The First Circle of Eight is formed

title: Bigby Exits the Circle of Eight
description:
(Exact Date Unknown)
Bigby abandons the Circle of Eight

title: The First Circle of Eight Ends
description:
(Exact Date Unknown)
The First Circle of Eight collapses

title: The Six
description:
(Exact Date Unknown)
The Six Shards form an alliance against Iuz.
Bigby abandons The Six, and sets up his ‘citadel of torment’ beneath Rauxes
Mordenkainen rescues Bigby from his insanity, subduing him and attempting to rehabilitate him.

title: The Second Circle of Eight
description:
(Exact Date Unknown)
The Second Circle of Eight is formed

title: 25 Years of Bigby
description:
(Exact Date Unknown)
Bigby undertakes a quest to understand his nature. This quest would take 25 years.

title: Scarlet Brotherhood on Firewatch Isle
description:
Spring/early Summer
Scarlet Brotherhood establishes operation on Firewatch Isle. They begin observation of the “rift” below the waters, where the Chained Oblivion seeps into this world. Firewatch Journal entry date: Wealsun 9th

title: Syrgaul Subdued
description:
Late Summer
Scarlet Brotherhood expedition at Firewatch Island encounters and subdues a transformed Syrgaul guarding the rift. Firewatch Journal entry date: Patchwall 3rd.

title: Watchers of the Oblivion
description:
Winter
Leader of Brotherhood expedition at Firewatch Isle begins to fear that the Watchers of the Oblivion have become corrupted by the Chained Oblivion, worshipping it rather than observing it. Firewatch Journal entry date: Ready’reat 25th.

title: Duke Luschan VII Sets Sail
description: Duke Luschan VII sets sail from Gradsul on an expedition to eradicate piracy in the Hold of the Sea Princes.

title: Battle of Monmurg
description: Battle of Monmurg: naval battle between Hold of the Sea Princes and allied Keoland & Duchy of Ulek fleets.

title: Sack of Monmurg
description:
Harvester 19 - Brewfest 2
Sack of Monmurg

title: Bigby's Revelation
description:
(Exact Date Unknown)
Bigby shares the truth of his nature with Mordenkainen and Tenser. Mordenkainen suggests calling the entire Circle of Eight (including past members) to decide what to do.

title: Betrayal of the Circle of Eight
description:
The Betrayal of the Circle of Eight: The members of the Circle (Mordenkainen, Bigby, Otiluke, Bucknard, Tenser, Leomund, Otto, and Nystul) and Drawmij & Rary meet in Greyhawk. From there they enter Mordenkainen’s mansion and are never seen again. According to Bigby, they were all slain by Robilar and Rary. However, Mordenkainen is confirmed to have survived.
Drawmij reawakened in his clone, with no memory of what happened. Bigby was said to survive, but no one has seen him. Rary is also rumored to be alive and hiding in the Shield Lands.

title: Arienh's Tragedy
description:
Arienh’s family drowns in a freak storm, which is caused by the summoning of the Eye of the Deep by the Scarlet Brotherhood. Arienh rejects the call to become the Herald.
Sgothgah, the Heretic Aboleth, accidentally is summoned to the Prime Material Plane along with the Eye in the Deep. Sgothgah consumes the mind of a Scarlet Brotherhood cultist and becomes “infected” with faith in the Chained Oblivion.

title: Ferrin Finds Arienh
description: Ferrin Kastilar finds a half-drowned Arienh.

title: Brotherhood documents the ritual
description: Leader of Brotherhood expedition documents the effect the ritual has on their rift. He describes a pulse of oil-on-water light with a radius beyond the island (which is 3 miles from the rift). Beings in the radius describe seeing the structure of reality for an instant. Inzarne, leader of the Watchers of Oblivion, blamed the leader of the Firewatch expedition of sabotauge. Journal entry date: Sunsebb 21st.

title: Sgothgah Captures the Eye
description: Sgothgah captures Eye in the Deep, hiding it in a distant isle far to the east where it was protected by underwater creatures. Sgothgah continued the Scarlet Brotherhood’s work of magically accelerating the Eye in the Deep’s growth and infusing it with the Chained Oblivion.

title: Brotherhood Corrupted by Sgothgah
description: Scarlet Brotherhood at Firewatch Island corrupted by Sgothgah. Journal reports that some have translucent, mucous covered skin like the servants of Sgothgah. Others suffer from the water sickness that Sgothgah inflicts on those who resist his corruption. Journal entry date: Coldeven 2nd.

title: Syrgaul Freed by Brotherhood
description:
The Brotherhood leader frees Syrgaul, on the orders of Sgothgah.
Sgothgah uses the power of the Chained Oblivion to enslave the island kingdom of Lendore, a realm of Suloise people on the southernmost of the Spindrift Isles. 
Sgothgah forces the enslaved Lendorians to sacrifice their people to power a magical ritual to accelerate the physical growth of the Eye in the Deep.

title: Skerrin earns a Favor
description: Skerrin Wavechaser acts as a go-between for Turtleback Agatha & the vampire consorts of Granny Nightshade, earning him a favor from Turtleback Agatha.

title: Skerrin Negotiates with Vampires
description:
Skerrin Wavechaser negotiates with the vampire consorts for safety to practice rituals in the Dreadwood in exchange for information on the descendants of the Betrayers in Saltmarsh. 

The vampires observe the Brotherhood perfecting their rituals and learn it in case it’s needed later.

title: Sgothgah Attempts Domination
description:
Sgothgah attempts to mentally dominate the Elven realm of the Spindrift Isles, in the same way as the Lendorians. His attempts fail and the creeping madness is contained.
Sgothgah orders the Lendorians to conquer the Spindrift Isles, but the Elves defeat the invasion fleet by summoning a mystical storm.

title: Visimar Leaves Dreadwood
description: Visimar, one of the vampire consorts of Granny Nightshade, leaves the Dreadwood. He travels to the Crystalmist Mountains, seeking to use the Brotherhood rituals to imbue the power of the Chained Oblivion into one of the giants living there.

title: Elves Invade Lendore Isle
description: The Elves of the Spindrift Isles invade the Lendore Isle to combat the madness. The Lendorians are exiled and the southern Spindrift Isle is blockaded.

title: Harid kills Brotherhood's leader
description: The leader of the Brotherhood expedition gives his final journal entry, detailing Sgothgah’s actions and the corruption of the Lendorians. He attempts to have the final message find its way to the Brotherhood by confronting the assassin (i.e. Harid) sent to kill him. This fails as Harid dumps the leader’s body (and the journal) in the cellar so that he can carry out whatever convoluted plan that ultimately ends up with Harid being corrupted by Sgothgah. Journal entry date: Goodmonth 16th.

title: Sgothgah flees Firewatch Isle
description: The Elves assault Firewatch Isle, slaughtering the Brotherhood expedition. The Elves assault the rift. Sgothgah is forced to flee. The Eye in the Deep may have also escaped.

title: Gerrike slain
description: Gerrike and Katrien Lankkamp slain in the Yeomanry during an ambush by centaurs raiding from the Little Hills.

title: Venerandris loses his shard
description: Venerandris, one of the Five Shards, attempts to kill Ogdrannal and absorb the Shard inside him. Venerandris is killed and his Shard flees.

title: MK is born
description: Mah’Kaylah’s fiery birth: the Memory of Iuz (one of its Nine Shards) inhabits the shell that Drawmij & Nenredhe were preparing. The demon manifests, destroys the Manor in the Yeomanry, and kills most of the people there. Afterwards, the person who would become Mah’Kaylah vanishes.

title: Skerrin finds Grimoire
description: Skerrin locates the Grimoire of the Deep. It is in the possession of the Plar of Hool, the wizard-ruler of the city of Hokar in the Hold of the Sea Princes. They try to steal it but fail in what Skerrin terms a “debacle.”

title: Ferrin and Eda talk
description: Ferrin Kastilar speaks with Eda Oweland about someone still looking for Arienh.

title: Visimar returns
description: Visimar, one of the vampire consorts of Granny Nightshade returns from the Crystalmist Mountains. He emphatically does not want to talk about what happened.

title: Mornie in Saltmarsh
description: Mornie arrives in Saltmarsh.

title: Airell in Saltmarsh
description: Airell arrives in Saltmarsh

title: Kellen gets the Grimoire
description: Gellan presents a book of magic (i.e. the Grimoire of the Deep) to Kellan.

title: Kellen Heralded
description: Kellan reads from the Grimoire of the Deep, becoming the Herald.

title: Brotherhood finds Eye
description: The Scarlet Brotherhood locates the Eye in the Deep. The Falling Star sent to capture it.

title: Falling star captures the Kraken
description: The Falling Star defeats Sgothgah and captures the Kraken.

title: Falling Star returns
description: The Falling Star returns with the captive Kraken.

title: IT Crew formed
description: IT Squad hired by various members of Saltmarsh council.

title: IT Crew first mission
description: Meeting at Saltmarsh town hall. They agree to the mission to the Lizardfolk cave.

title: Lizardfolk battle
description:
Sail for the Lizardfolk cave, attacked by Sahuagin. Battle with Lizardfolk and surrender.
The Falling Star departs Abbey Isle for the Styes.

title: Lizardfolk negotiations
description: Negotiations with Lizardfolk.

title: Hool Marshes
description:
IT Squad travels through the Hool Marshes, foiling several Bullywug ambushes.
(Scarlet Brotherhood performs a ritual, corrupting the Treant)

title: Thousand Teeth
description:
Battle of Thousand Teeth.
(Joza finds the cultists in the swamp)
Sgothgah arrives in the Styes, and enslaves several of the Falling Star’s officers (including Arjan Mon)

title: Joza
description: IT Squad meets Joza and attacks Bullywug camp. They discover and battle the Corrupted Treant. Return to the Lizardfolk cave.

title: Lizardfolk feast
description: Celebrations with Lizardfolk.

title: First mission complete
description:
Return to Saltmarsh, reporting to the council. The IT squad goes its separate ways.
The Falling Star and Sgothgah attack Abbey Isle. Most of the Scarlet Brotherhood killed. The Falling Star officers free themselves from enslavement, and the Falling Star flees (settling in Port Torvin). Sgothgah brings the Kraken back to the Styes.

title: First downtime
description:
Downtime: 
Airell schemes

Arienh works as a healer & gets a house

Kellan works for Keledek

Mah-Kaylah trains

Mornie visits the Styes

In the Styes, Mr. Dory is ‘altered’ by Sgothgah. He isn’t enslaved, but makes a deal with the Aboleth in exchange for his life.

title: First Lantern Ghost murder
description:
Richfest, a week-long midsummer celebration:
Mah’Kaylah goes home with Xendros

Airell picks pockets

Kellan & Mornie make friends

In the Styes, Jarme is enslaved. He commits the first Lantern Ghost murders.

title: Saltmarsh Riots
description: The Saltmarsh Riots: the Dwarves invade Saltmarsh. Airell is attacked in his bed.

title: Dwarf politics
description: Negotiations between Saltmarsh council and the Dwarves. Arienh ministers to Eda, overhears that Manistrad has petitioned Duke Feldrin to intervene.

title: Oil of Etherealness
description: Anders Solmar summons the IT squad, hires them to get the Oil of Etherealness from the Styes.

title: Rat's Tail Sail
description: IT Squad sets sail. The Rat’s Tail is attacked by the Falling Star. They are met by the Sundowner, pretending to be the pirates.

title: Port Torvin
description: Arrive in Port Torvin, late at night.

title: Undercover pirates
description: IT Squad enters Port Torvin, pretending to be pirates, offloading the smuggled goods.

title: Yusgrolir's Party
description: Garden party at Yusgrolir’s manor. Half the party trapped in an hedge maze in the Ethereal Plane. Kellan and Airell battle Yusgrolir and ogres. IT Squad leaves Port Torvin.

title: Sail to Styes
description: Sail to the Styes

title: Battle at the Styes
description: The everlasting joy that was The Styes: Master Refrum, Mr. Dory, and the running battle to retake the Falling Star. Sail to recover the Rat’s Tail.

title: Rest
description: Rest and recover. Set sail for Saltmarsh.

title: Back to Saltmarsh
description: Return to Saltmarsh, with a hero’s welcome.

title: Preparations
description: Make preparations to leave for Abbey Isle.

title: Abbey Isle exploration
description:
Sail for Abbey Isle. Battle with the Sahuagin.
Meet the priests and soldiers of Abbey Isle, make a deal with them. The priests plan to betray them.
Explore the monoliths. Kellen has a vision.

title: Winding Way and Sea Cave
description:
Ambush the priests. Explore the Winding Way and the Sea Cave.
(In Saltmarsh: Duke Feldrin’s fleet arrives. Gellan Primewater arrested.)

title: Stormy ship ambush
description:
Return to Saltmarsh ahead of a thunderstorm. Discover Duke Feldrin’s fleet. 
Board the ships during the storm and capture them.
The Second Saltmarsh Riots: During negotiations, the Duke violates a truce by attacking.
Gellan released from

title: Independent Saltmarsh
description:
Saltmarsh breaks away from the Duke, commandeers his fleet.
Everyone discovers that Yusgrolir is sailing a fleet to conquer Saltmarsh.
Skerrin tries to blackmail Airell.
Duke Feldrin evacuates Saltmarsh
Pirates in jail “escape” and are killed by MK.

title: Preparations for Yusgrolir
description: Prepare ships and crew to defend against Yusgrolir’s fleet.

title: Battle of Abbey Isle
description:
Battle of Abbey Isle: victory for the Saltmarsh fleet
Massacre of Sea Grove discovered.
Skerrin Wavechaser lies to Mornie

title: Petition to the king
description: Eliander leaves to petition the king.

title: Traveling downtime
description:
Airell & Mornie visit Burle and head to the Yeomanry for the funeral of Tangle Bough

Mah’Kaylah sets sail with Xendros for Iuz

Kellen visits Seaton, and then the Hold of the Sea Princes (by way of the Styes).

Arienh builds a memorial to Ferrin, uses spells to enrich the land, and begins research on the Sahuagin in Eliander’s Library.

title: More traveling downtime
description:
Airell & Mornie return to Burle from the funeral. Airell continues studying from Kiara Shadowbreaker. Mornie begins crafting more Walloping Ammo.

Mah’Kaylah reaches Iuz.

Kellen returns from the Sea Princes and attempts to craft a toy steam engine. It fails.

Arienh finishes her research and begins spying on Skerrin, using her wildshape.

title: Parties everywhere
description:
Airell & Mornie: party in Burle!

Mah’kaylah: party in Iuz!

Arienh & Kellen: party in Saltmarsh!

title: Working downtime
description:
Airell heads to Gradsul, to continue his studies.

Mornie finishes making Walloping Ammo, then returns to Saltmarsh to study history of the region in Eliander’s library.

Mah’kaylah enjoys scenic Iuz.

Kellen builds a working toy steam engine, begins working as a tinker at the Dwarven Anvil (the town blacksmith).

Arienh continues spying on Skerrin.

title: King and Feldren dispute Saltmarsh
description: Eliander returns from the capital with news: the King of Keoland is going to personally intervene in Saltmarsh’s dispute with Duke Feldren. He will arrive before Needfest.

title: More working downtime
description:
Airell continues studying in Gradsul, supplementing his income by working as a street card hustler.

Mornie finishes her research on history and begins researching Suloise artifacts in Keledek’s library.

Mah’Kaylah begins her voyage back from Iuz.

Kellen continues to work as a tinker.

Arienh begins studying the obelisks and tomes on Abbey Isle, with the help of Keledek the Unspoken.

title: More working downtime
description:
Airell continues studying & working Gradsul.

Mornie finishes her research and speaks with Krag the gravedigger about Saltmarsh history.

Kellen works as a tinker

Arienh splits time between researching Scarlet Brotherhood customs from the tomes and spying on Skerrin. She makes an unexpected discovery…

title: Jarme arrested
description: Jarme arrested as the Lantern Ghost Murderer.

title: Refrum brings Nenredhe
description:
Refrum bargains with Mr. Dory to wait until after Needfest to execute Jarme.
Refrum arrives at The Manor, calls in a favor to Nenredhe.

title: Jarme is killed
description: Mr. Dory has Jarme hung, burnt, and his ashes scattered into the bay.

title: Refrum and Nenredhe in king's army
description: Refrum and Nenredhe arrive in Seaton, join Kimbertos’s army as healers.

title: Kimbertos in Saltmarsh
description: Kimbertos I of Scotti arrives in Saltmarsh by land.

title: The Manor is destroyed
description:
Dukes Luschan and Feldrin arrive in Saltmarsh by sea.
Arienh interviews a vampire.
Sgothgah sends his Chuul and Skum minions to destroy the Manor and kill everyone inside.

title: Arienh frees the vampire
description:
Mah’Kaylah & Xendros return (by ship) from Iuz.
Arienh sails to the Hool Marsh and back; she frees the vampire.

title: Saltmarsh Troubles
description: Kimbertos holds meetings with the Dukes and council regarding the “Saltmarsh Troubles.”

title: Airell back in Saltmarsh
description: Airell arrives in Saltmarsh from Gradsul.

title: IT Crew meets the King
description: Invicem Tollerando summoned to an audience with the King.

title: Free City of Saltmarsh
description:
King Kimbertos makes his pronouncement:
Duke Feldrin is promoted to general of the King’s Rearguard.

Saltmarsh is declared a Free City.

The Duchy of Salinmoor reorganized into the Barony of Salinmoor (after some territory is given to Saltmarsh and some to the Duchy of Gradsul).

Eliander Fireborn is knighted and appointed to rule the Barony of Salimoor, from its capital, Seaton.

Sir Piersym of Seconforth appointed to the Saltmarsh Council.

Mornie (and others) are approached by Nenredhe, and given the mission to go to the Styes.

title: Aboleth ambush
description: Two Aboleth ambush Sgothgah at Landgrave’s Folly. Sgothgah is forced to flee, leaving the Kraken trapped in the pit (protected by a magical wall of force).

title: Saltmarsh elections
description: Saltmarsh reelects Eda Owland, Gellan Primewater, and Anders Solmar to the town council.

title: Manor battle Chuul
description: IT Squad sails to the Styes, stopping at the Manor first. They battle the remaining Chuul.

title: Styes sickness
description: IT Squad enters the Styes & investigates. Airell gets the Water Sickness. Kellen enslaved by Sgothgah.

title: Captured by Skum
description:
IT Squad interviews Emil Trantor in the Asylum and Constable Jute. They discover the half-sunken ship and are captured in a Skum ambush. 
Airell sneaks away before the fight.

title: Sgothgah's Slaves
description:
IT Squad recover from their defeat, and are all enslaved by Sgothgah.
Airell gets his stuff back.

title: Battle of Landgrave's Folly
description:
Battle of Landgrave’s Folly: Sgothgah and the other two Aboleth are killed. The Eye of the Deep is freed and flees into the open ocean.
IT Crew returns to the Styes, meet Emperor Nathanial Mon.

title: Arienh goes boom
description:
Nenredhe & Drawmij appear. Nenredhe cures the IT Crew of their slimy affliction. Mornie is expelled from her organization by Nenredhe.
The Battle of the Hemlock Pit: Arienh blows up Dory’s warehouse. Mr. Dory is killed. Harid joins with the IT Crew.

title: Burglary and murder
description: Airell & Mornie rob a merchant’s house. They go to Rashlen’s home, are ambushed, and killed Rashlen.

title: Skerrin's Dreams
description: IT Crew lays low in The Styes. Kellen uses Dream on Skerrin. They are picked up by the Falling Star on the 3rd.

title: Flying T-Rex!
description:
The Falling Star arrives in Saltmarsh at dusk. Skerrin has fled Saltmarsh, leaving a letter blaming the IT Crew. Mk & Xendros have a tiff.
Sahuagin Attack: Flying T-Rex! Eda (almost) Dies!

title: Turtleback Agatha
description:
IT Crew tracks Skerrin to Turtleback Agatha’s home. Arienh make a bargain with the hag.
The IT Crew continues to Seaton, meeting Kellen’s family.

title: Skerrin's fall
description:
Airenh, Kellen, and MK are summoned by Eliander. Airell & Mornie find the inn where Skerrin is staying.
Skerrin’s Fall: the IT Crew attack Skerrin & his men before he can sail away. Skerrin & most of his men are killed.
IT Crew jailed in St. Cuthbert’s House. Airell is disguised as a crewmember, also jailed.

title: Custody at Eliander's
description: Eliander takes the IT Crew (minus Airell) into his custody.

title: Relax in the Citadel
description:
IT Crew relaxes in the Citadel.
Airell is interrogated, but convinces the priests he is crazy.

title: Jedgement of Eliander
description: Judgement of Eliander: A contingent from Saltmarsh speaks on the IT Crew’s behalf, as does Emperor Mon, and the archmage Drawmij. Skerrin is declared a traitor and the IT Crew are freed.

title: Downtime
description:
Airell departs Seaton for Gradsul, to complete his studies.

Arienh, Kellen, MK, & Mornie return to Saltmarsh. 

Arienh brews potions & learns Ancient Suloise from MK. 

Mornie begins selling the items the IT Crew has collected. 

Kellen does magical research.

title: Downtime
description:
Airell finishes his studies in Gradsul.

Arienh continues her potion making and learning Ancient Suloise.

Kellen spends the month in Seaton, introducing Gellan Primewater to people in the Gnome community. She researches at the Academy and studies the book given to her by the Hag.

Mornie travels to Blue, selling the Cli Lyre and doing a ‘small favor’ for Xendros.

title: Con against Duke Feldren begins
description:
Airell begins laying the groundwork for his con against Duke Feldren. He does magical research as well.

Arienh, MK, Kellen, & Mornie hunt Perytons in the Flotsam Isles.

title: Sea Grove ritual
description:
Airell: meets with Duke Feldren.

Arienh: lead the ritual at the Sea Grove, receiving an ill omen.

Kellen, MK, Mornie: Attend the ritual at the Sea Grove.

title: Pixie Quest
description:
Airell: the Duke’s Gambit hit’s a snag… Decides to head towards Greyhawk.

Arienh & MK: Pixie Quest! Head to Burle, then the Little Hills. Joined by Xendros & Thokk, then Wydhaus. Reach the lake of Pakilis the Druid.

Kellen & Mornie: Unicorn Search! Travel on ship to Safeton by way of Gradsul, Gryax, and Scant.

title: Unicorn
description:
Airell arrives in Greyhawk.

Arienh & MK: Travel north through the Little Hill & find Reyna Yargrove. Then travel across Keoland to city of Niol Dra.

Kellen & Mornie: Find the unicorn! They travel overland through Celene, meeting Garik the Werebear. Kellen gets a Pseudodragon! They rescue Kejal the Waywatcher from Orcs & a Tanarukk.

title: Feywild adventures
description:
Airell: in Greyhawk, doing Airell-type things.

Arienh & MK: Travel north to the Axewood & enter the Feywild to battle the Voice of Scorn. Due to the Feywild’s magic, the two days there are two weeks in real time. They then return to Niol Dra.

Kellen & Mornie: return home to Saltmarsh on ship.

title: Parties everywhere
description:
Airell: party in Greyhawk!

Arienh & MK: party in Niol Dra as guests of the king!

Kellen & Mornie: party in Saltmarsh!

title: To Greyhawk
description:
Airell: doing more of the same in Greyhawk.

Arienh, Kellen, MK, & Mornie: travel by ship to Greyhawk.

title: Greyhawk
description:
Airell: finishes his time in Greyhawk and sets sail for Saltmarsh.

Arienh, Kellen, MK, & Mornie: reach Greyhawk by third week. Spend a week in Greyhawk before turning around and sailing back

title: To Saltmarsh
description:
Airell: travel by ship to Saltmarsh

Arienh, Kellen, MK, & Mornie: travel by ship from Greyhawk to Saltmarsh.

title: Confronting Eda
description:
Airell, Arienh, Kellen, MK, & Mornie: Party in Saltmarsh!

Kellen & Arienh confront Eda Oweland about whomever is looking for Arienh.

title: Downtime
description:
Airell: Doing Airell Things in Saltmarsh.

Arienh: Crafting magic items

Kellen: Reading her creep book gift from the hag.

Mornie: Crafting magic items.

title: Sahuagin infiltration
description: IT Crew set sail to infiltrate the Sahuagin Lair, meeting Varsis Liadon, Borgas the Locathah, and Gedik the Orc.

title: Xendros departs
description: IT Crew briefs the council. Xendros leaves Saltmarsh.

title: Planning to lure out Sahuagin
description: A plan is formed to lure out the Sahuagin.

title: Anders fooled
description: At a council meeting, Anders is revealed to have been fooled by Streth Roughstride.

title: For the Cove
description: The forces of Saltmarsh depart for the Cove

title: Sack of Saltmarsh
description: The Sack of Saltmarsh by the Sahuagin forces and the Scarlet Brotherhood (Liup, Nhemeir, Streth).

title: Battle of the Cove
description:
The Battle of the Cove
The Battle of Saltmarsh: Sahuagin defeated at heavy cost. Liup, Nhemeir, & Streth killed.

title: IT Crew gets a house
description:
The IT Crew chisel away the symbol of the Chained Oblivion from the standing stones. 
Sir Eliander arrives in Saltmarsh’s with more guns. And ships.
Darven Windhill is promoted temporarily to the council.
Eliander offers his house to the IT Crew.

title: Eda funeral
description:
The funeral of Eda Oweland. 
Varsis the Shadar-Kai is hung.

title: Cannons from the Cove
description: The Saltmarsh navy recovers its cannons from the Cove.

title: Kiara is coming. Drawmij is back from the moon
description:
The scouts from Berle arrive in Saltmarsh. Kiara Shadowbreaker is marching to the town’s aid.

Drawmij teleports back to the Sea Cow from Celene (the moon).

title: Skerrin planning a sacrifice
description: Arienh scries on Skerring planning to sacrifice 300 slaves at sea.

title: Sail to intercept Skerrin
description: The Falling Star and Fury of Gradsul set sail to intercept Skerrin’s fleet.

title: The Final? death of Skerrin
description: The Battle of the Open Ocean: the Final (?) Death of Skerrin

title: Rescue of the Styes
description:
IT Crew & Falling Star rescue the Styes.
The Kraken attacks! Drawmij teleports the IT Crew (minus Airell) to the Sea Cow.

title: Plar of Hool
description:
IT Crew & Drawmij teleport to Hokar, have an audience with the Plar of Hool.

The Plar of Hool teleports with the IT Crew & Drawmij to Port Toli, have an audience with Glia Blackswan.

An plan is hatched to have the IT Crew be bait for the Kraken. They wait outside the Bay of Toli.

title: Death of the Kraken
description: The Battle of Toli Bay: the Eye in the Deep is destroyed.

title: Sea Cow
description: IT Crew & Drawmij teleport back to the Sea Cow, sail for Saltmarsh.

title: Back to Saltmarsh
description: IT Crew return to Saltmarsh.

title: Rest
description: A long deserved rest…

title: Housewarming
description:
Settling into life in their new home:

Airell shops in Seaton, then trains in Saltmarsh.

Arienh helps Mornie craft & searches for a possible acolyte.

Kellen finishes her creepy gift from Turtleback Agatha.

MK builds a gazebo.

Mornie sells things and finishes the earrings.

title: Parties everywhere
description: Everyone parties in Saltmarsh!

title: Learnings
description:
Airell continues to train, but also visits Gradsul to check out the Blind Father’s activities. After he returns, he continues to train but also performs the ritual to awaken the Warden of the Fore (which summons Ajarmash the Rakshasa)

Arienh starts modifying her old house into a brewery. She identifies Gedik as a possible acolyte and begins training him in the Old Faith.
Kellen builds an internal fan system for their new home, then constructs weird magi-tech components for her spells, and finally tries her hand at gambling.

MK tutors Mornie on Ancient Suloise.

Mornie continues learning Ancient Suloise but also helps Arienh convert her former home into a brewery.

Ajarmash, as the Garden Quarter Strangler, murders six people.

title: Fake Airell murderer
description:
IT Crew begins wind walking to Greyhawk.

Ajarmash, disguised as Airell, murders his seventh victim. This time, he is “caught”, revealing the identity of the Garden Quarter Strangler.

title: MK punching guards
description: IT Crew arrives in Greyhawk. MK starts a turf war with the City Watch over 5gp.

title: BroSeb
description:
Airell is framed by the Bishop of St. Cuthbert (actually Ajarmash) and arrested.

Brother Sebastian offers his help to the IT Crew.

Kellen & Mornie help break Airell out of jail.

title: Battle of Unwanted Guests
description:
IT Crew (minus the wanted criminals) visit house of Bishop of St. Cuthbert. 

IT Crew goes to Hacrar’s house, discover the succubus, & kill her.

Battle of Unwanted Guests: Ajarmash & Yugoloths arrive at Hacrar’s house. Ajarmash plane shifts.

title: Warden of the Fore awakens
description:
Battle of the Botanical Gardens: Ajarmash is bound into the Warden of the Fore. Airell is arrested as the Strangler.

IT Crew gets the reward. They meet the Lord Mayor, Bishop of Zilchus, and the head of the Thieves Guild.

title: Toymaker
description: Kellen, Arienh, & Mornie visit the Toymaker.

title: Airell is dead, long live Airell
description: The execution of Airell, the Garden City Strangler.

title: Airell and the weird finger
description: Airell reincarnated by Arienh.

title: Arienh's dominance
description:
Airell, Kellen, Mornie, & MK: mellow times in Greyhawk.

Arienh: Establishing her dominance in Saltmarsh

title: Crafting and learning
description:
Airell:

Arienh: In Saltmarsh, teaching Gedik & harvesting Rapture Weed.

Kellen: Crafting a magic item, learning to lie, trying to join the Guild of Wizardry

Mornie: Crafting a magic item, learning Ancient Suloise

MK: Teaching Ancient Suloise & learning the subtle art of intimidation.

title: Crafting and learning
description:
Airell:

Arienh: Back in Greyhawk. Travelling the region while teaching Gedik.

Kellen: Crafting a magic item, learning to lie, research

Mornie: Crafting a magic item, learning Ancient Suloise, research

MK: Teaching Ancient Suloise & learning intimidation actually is a subtle art.

title: MK Quest - sail
description: MK Quest: Arienh, Gedik, MK set sail to Hardby.

title: MK Quest - Hardby
description: MK Quest: Arienh, Gedik, MK arrive in Hardby.

title: MK Question - to the Yeomanry
description: MK Quest: the trio begin Wind Walking from Hardby to the Yeomanry.

title: Klee boom boom
description: MK Quest: the trio arrive in the Yeomanry, near Longspear. They travel north, find the location of MK’s family. They are joined by Klee.

title: MK finds family
description: MK Quest: trio travels to Grunhalten. MK is reunited with her father, uncle, and brother. Stories are told over a long lunch. MK has a bad dream that night.

title: Attach of the giants in Barrowbend
description:
MK Quest: trio, with the Lankkamps, visit grave of Gerrieke and Katriene. 

The Battle of Barrowbend: giants attack.

title: Crafting and learning
description:
Airell: Crafting a magic item, training, and Airell shenanigans

Arienh: Harvesting seaweed in Saltmarsh, then exploring the Greyhawk region, all while teaching

Kellen: Crafting a magic item, learning to lie, research

Mornie: Crafting a magic item, learning Ancient Suloise, & research.

MK: Teaching Ancient Suloise & learning that intimidation is about the threat, not the action.

title: Parties everywhere
description: Drunken shenanigans in Greyhawk!

title: More crafting and learning
description:
Airell: Crafting a magic item, training, and gambling.

Arienh: potion making & training in Saltmarsh

Kellen: Crafting a magic item

Mornie: Crafting a magic item

MK: Understanding that intimidation is about the way you say it and the words you choose.

title: Silly times
description: Silly times in Greyhawk!

title: More crafting and learning
description:
Airell: Crafting a magic item, training, and gambling.

Arienh: potion making & training in Saltmarsh

Kellen: Crafting a magic item

Mornie: Crafting a magic item

MK: Finally getting the idea of how to intimidate someone.

title: Heroes Feast by Arienh
description: Arienh returns to Greyhawk, and provides a Heroe’s Feast for the IT Crew.

title: Castle Greyhawk Smiles
description: Travel to Castle Greyhawk, meeting the Delvers of Sehanine (elves) and the Union of Smiles (humans/dwarves)

title: Tower of Zagyg
description: IT Crew enters the Tower of Zagyg: navigates the Lighting Stair, the False Crypts, and the Unendeing Stair. Flicker seemingly killed at the very entrance to Zagyg’s Promenade.

title: Zagyg's Promenade
description: IT Crew enters Zagyg’s Promenade: fights a serpentine medusa and the goblin archmage Zenopus. The statues of Irrik and Tasha found.

title: Tasha appears and dies
description:
IT Crew ambushed by automatons on Zagyg’s Promenade, flees to the Hall of Memory. 

They return to the Promenade, teleporting to Zagyg’s Chambers at the very top of the Guild of Wizardry in Greyhawk City.

Tasha is restored, and binds MK’s demon (actually a Shard of Iuz). They all go to the Godtrap, where Tasha betrays them. 

Tasha (actually a simulacrum) is defeated, the Demonomicon handed over to Zagyg, and a pact forged between Kellen and Zagyg.

title: Training & Research
description:
Airell: Training & Research

Arienh: Training & research

Kellen: Research

Mornie: Selling diamonds, learning Celestial, and gathering info on the Brotherhood (meeting a spy).

MK: Thinks about her Mommy, talks to Drawmij, gets hugs from Mornie.

title: Letter from Waldorf
description: Airell gets a letter from Waldorf

title: Airell visits Waldorf
description:
Airell visits Waldorf, escapes the trap & is smuggled away in a barrel.

The rest of the IT Crew is gathered by Org Nenshen. 

Org Nenshens questions the IT Crew about Airell & the Rakshasa. He decides the IT Crew should leave Greyhawk.

title: Arienh connection
description:
The IT Crew prepares to leave. Arienh infodumps on all the connections between the Obelisks, Iuz, his nine Shards, etc. 
Airell talks to Eda. 
Irrik Sellum is un-petrified.

title: To Scant
description: IT Crew sails for Scant aboard the Silkworm

title: Xendros meets with Waldorf
description: Arienh scrys on Xendros, who is meeting with Waldorf. He is one of the Shards.

title: IT crew arrives in Scant
description: IT Crew arrives in Scant

title: Scant explodes
description:
IT Crew explores Scant; visits the Sturdy Spruce. 
Mornie makes contact with Aelar.

title: Scant beast attacks
description:
Kellen buys a sword. 
Arienh & Airell visit a shipwreck.
A beast mysteriously attacks the mansion of a respected Scant family.

title: Mornie and Drawmij
description:
Mornie gets a sending from “Drawmij”
Drawmij gets a sending from “Mornie”

title: Bigby dies
description:
Mornie meets with Drawmij: it’s a trap!
Drawmij is poisoned and his body taken over by Bigby.
The IT Crew is met by Eri, who lies about lying, but gets them into Bigby’s tower. The IT Crew has a conversation with Bigby, which is interrupted by Nenredhe (and company) attacking.
Bigby is killed. In his place the Strength of Iuz manifests. The IT Crew almost destroy the Shard before it is reabsorbed by someone (likely Iuz).

title: Harid's plan
description:
The IT Crew camps outside Scant, until they are picked up by the Falling Star.
Harid is on the Falling Star, and pitches them a convoluted plan.

title: Falling Star sails to Naeri
description: The Falling Star (with IT Crew) sail to Naeri, in the County of Idee.

title: Downtime training
description:
Airell: Training & crafting

Arienh: Training & crafting

Kellen: Creating the ritual to destroy the Grimoire

Mornie: Training & crafting

MK: Training

title: Mornie reads Grimoire
description:
Mornie reads the Grimoire, gets a bad headache.

Arienh trips balls & has a dream

title: Theft of a Chalice
description: The IT Crew, led by MK, investigate the theft of a chalice.

title: Arienh reads Grimoire
description:
IT Crew meets with Harid, agrees to his crazy plan.

Arienh reads from the Grimoire. She’s fine.

Kellen, Mornie, and Airell steal a statue.

title: MK's friends
description: The three muggers/thieves of the chalice are delivered to MK. She spares(!) them and makes them part of the crew (!?) of the Falling Star.

title: Falling Star sails for Kro Terlep
description: Falling Star (with IT Crew and Harid) set sail for Kro Terlep.

title: Falling Star arrives in Kro Terlep
description: Falling Star arrives in Kro Terlep

title: Downtime training
description:
Airell: Training

Arienh: Crafting

Kellen: Teaching

Mornie: Training

MK: Training

title: Gardens of Order
description:
IT Crew meets Loh’Zerith in Gardens of Order. They try to kill him, then flee Kro Terlep with the Falling Star crew.

Running the Gauntlet: the Falling Star fights past the Brotherhood blockade at the river mouth and into the Azure Sea.

title: Evading Brotherhood fleet
description: IT Crew & Falling Star attempt to evade the Brotherhood fleet.

title: Brotherhood attempts to steal the Grimoire
description: Brotherhood boarding crew teleports aboard the Falling Star, attempting to steal the Grimoire.

title: Voice of Obedience
description:
The Voice of Obedience teleports aboard the Falling Star with an offer of truce. The IT Crew is teleported back to Kro Terlep for an audience with the Father of Obedience.

Parlay with the Father of Obedience. He reads the Grimoire and demands that the Watchers of Oblivion have their minds read. Loh’Zerith and Inzarne attack the Father before teleporting away.

The IT Crew and Voice of Obedience teleport to the Tower of the Eye. They destroy the Grimoire copies and kill Inzarne and Loh’Zerith.

IT Crew wind walks to safety. The Voice of Obedience heads back to Kro Terlep.

title: Falling Star sails for Gryrax
description: IT Crew rendezvous with the Falling Star, set sail for Gryrax.

title: Voice of Obedience visit
description: Voice of Obedience teleports with Harid aboard the Falling Star. They return borrowed and stolen items, with some rewards.

title: IT Crew arrives in Gryrax
description: IT Crew arrives in Gryrax.

title: Shopping
description: Shopping in Gryrax

title: MK's olympic run
description: Party in Gryrax! MK participates in the Trials!

title: Falling Star sails for Breekas Teeth
description: The Falling Star and IT Crew sail from Gryrax, south along the Amedio Jungle, and beyond the Azure Sea. They cross the Pearl Sea for an Archipelago known as Breekas Teeth.

title: People of Nalnaliras
description: Falling Star replenish supplies on an isle in Breekas Teeth. The IT Crew meet the People of Nalnaliras.

title: Elder Tempest
description: Falling Star and IT Crew flee Breekas Teeth, chased by the Elder Tempest.

title: Tilva Strait
description: Falling Star sails north for the Tilva Strait

title: Anthala Quen
description:
Falling Star is escorted by the Scarlet Brotherhood through the Tilva Straight. 

On the 19th, the Brotherhood ships are attacked by the Area Mors and the dragon turtle. The IT Crew meets Anthala Quen. 

They also take on survivors: Quarion, Coraline, and Yenellis.

title: Falling Star sails for Ansabo
description: Falling Star sails for the west coast of Ansabo, in the Lordship of the Isles.

title: Anthala Quen and the Old Faith
description: IT Crew speaks with Anthala Quen, learns the history of the Old Faith. Arienh accepts Anthala’s modifications to the challenge.

title: Falling Star sails for Jehlum
description: Falling Star sails for Jehlum, an eastern island in the Lordship of the Isles.

title: Arienh's cursed challenge
description:
Falling Star reaches Jehlum, and the village of Lendorian exiles.

The challenge between the IT Crew and Anthala Quen & Cindoarrath the dragon turtle. Airell fails the challenge when he swims under water to attack Cindoarrath. Arien leaves the party, teleporting through a tree.

IT Crew accidentally returns to village of Lendorian refugees on Jehlum Isle.

Arienh returns to Saltmarsh, finds out Gedik was killed by Ma Garret. In confrontation, Arienh goes T-Rex and ends the Garret clan.

title: Arienh deal with Turtleback Agatha
description:
IT Crew sails into the open ocean, debates how to find Arienh. Kellen contacts Drawmij.

Arienh visit Turtleback Agatha and makes a deal with her to save Saltmarsh. It involves making a trade with Granny Nightshade and then double-crossing her.

title: Arienh and Agatha travel to Janustrem Depths
description:
IT Crew continues search for Arienh, with Kellen contacting Drawmij and Airell contacting Eda. Airell asks Eda where Arienh is going: Scornkeep. They decide to return to Saltmarsh.

Arienh (wildshaped as a bird) and Agatha travel to Janustrem Depths.

title: Arienh and Agatha reach Scornkeep
description:
Arienh and Agatha reach Scornkeep. Arienh trades the Sword of the Betrayers for the moment of time where Stratis slew Lethregal and fathered Hieroneous. She stabs Granny Nightshade in the hand, leaving with command of the Scorn Court’s cadre of Oni. (See -621 CY above)

IT Crew (with Coraline, Yennelis, and Quarion) teleports to Seaton via teleportation circle. They meet Eliander and take horses to Saltmarsh. The people of Saltmarsh welcome them and tell them what Arienh did to Ma Garret. 

Vohen uses the sending stone to contact Mornie; tells her that Sohral has had a seizure. Sohral repeats the words “The Daughter of the Betrayers has undone the Father of the Invincible.” 

Airell contacts Eda, who tells them that the place where they will be able to meet up with Arienh is Gradsul.

title: Travel to Gradsul
description:
Arienh, Agatha, and Oni travel through the Dreadwood towards Gradsul.

IT Crew sails from Saltmarsh for Gradsul.

title: Priest of Pelor pays
description: IT Crew reaches Gradsul. Kellen attacks a priest of Pelor.

title: Hiding in Gradsul
description: IT Crew hides out in Gradsul

title: Saltmarsh attacked by Granny Nightshade
description:
IT Crew still hiding out in Gradsul

Arienh, Agatha, and Oni reach Gradsul.

Saltmarsh is attacked by two of the vampire consorts of Granny Nightshade.

title: DarkRienh is cured
description: IT Crew battles Arienh, Agatha, and the Oni. They manage to remove the madness from Arienh. Then they have to flee the Thieves Guild / Church of Pelor hit squad coming their way. Owl Express loses their followers.

title: Dealings with Vampires / First Betrayer
description:
IT Crew attacked by the Wild Hunt led by a vampire consort of Granny Nightshade. The vampire places a geas on MK in exchange for information.

IT Crew tree-teleports back to Saltmarsh, finds the two other vampire consorts finishing a ritual that would kill all Betrayers. Arienh steps into the black flame, becoming the First Betrayer.

IT Crew rides to Berle, heading towards Scornkeep in the Dreadwood.

title: To Janustrem Depths
description: IT Crew rides to Janustrem Depths.

title: Deal with Granny Nightshade
description:
IT Crew (using Animal Shapes) flies to Scornkeep. They are discovered by the undead giants standing sentry, and race inside Scornkeep itself. They battle a maddened Granny Nightshade, drawing the Sword of the Betrayers from her hand. The IT Crew makes a deal with Granny Nightshahde and is teleported back to Janustrem Depths.

Riding Phantom Steeds, they arrive back at Berle and collapse to sleep. But are awoken by Coraline having a stress episode. They calm her and go back to sleep.

title: Staff of Deepwood
description:
In Berle, Arienh is given the Staff of the Deepwood by the Silverstand Elves.

IT Crew rides back to Saltmarsh, and a night on the town. Arienh is visited by Agatha. Airell is visited by Olidammara.

title: Long rest
description: Long rest in Saltmarsh

title: To Lendor
description: IT Crew teleports to Pontylver, then sails towards Lendorian Maelstrom

title: Maelstrom and Firewatch Isle
description: IT Crew flies through Maelstrom, arrives at Firewatch Isle, and battles massive Peryton. First instance of magic not working right on Firewatch Isle.

title: Madness at Firewatch Isle
description:
IT Crew explores Firewatch Isle, noticing madness spreading in some of their people. Explore the abbey. They find Jazdirzoud, who is nearly dead. He asks them to save his remaining people on nearby island.
Arienh & Mornie scout nearby island (Lof Ospyr), spot the Lendorians held captive by the Rune Takers (a band of crazed Elves). They flee back to Firewatch Isle.
IT Crew returns and is ambushed by the Rune Takers. They fight off the ambush, find the Lendorians dead, and return to Firewatch Isle.
During the rest, Mornie reviews all the Firewatch Isle journals left by the Brotherhood.

title: Destruction of the Grimoire
description:
IT Crew trades restorative magic with Jasdirzoud for his services.
Battle of the Rift: IT Crew performs the ritual to destroy the Grimoire of the Deep and destroy Sgothgah. IT Crew flees to Lof Ospyr and then to Pontylver.

title: Rest in Pontylver
description: Recover in Pontylver. Falling Star arrives.

title: Spindrift Isles
description: Sail for the Spindrift Isles.

title: Audience with People of the Testing
description: Audience with the Triarchs of the People of the Testing.

title: Training in Spindrift Isles
description:
Airell: Training & Crafting Pontylver 

Arienh: Teaching and Relaxing in Spindrift Isles

Kellen: “Relaxing” in the Spindrift Isles

Mah-Kaylah: Training in Spindrift Isles

Mornie: Selling magic items in Pontylver

title: Party in Pontylver
description:
Airell: partying in Pontylver 

Arienh: partying in Spindrift Isles

Kellen: “partying” in Spindrift Isles

Mah-Kaylah: partying in Spindrift Isles

Mornie: partying in Pontylver

title: More training
description:
Airell: Training & Crafting Pontylver 

Arienh: Teaching and Brewing potions in Spindrift Isles

Kellen: “Relaxing” in the Spindrift Isles

Mah-Kaylah: Training in Spindrift Isles

Mornie: Selling magic items, Researching & Diamond shopping in Pontylver

title: More partying
description:
Airell: partying in Pontylver 

Arienh: leading Druidic rites in Spindrift Isles

Kellen: “partying” in Spindrift Isles

Mah-Kaylah: partying in Spindrift Isles

Mornie: partying in Pontylver

title: Even more training
description:
Falling Star sails from Spindrift Isles. Downtime:

Airell: training 

Arienh: brewing potions

Kellen: “teaching”

Mah-Kaylah: training

Mornie: training

title: Falling Star takes to air
description: Falling Star arrives in Breekas Teeth, loads up the People of Nalnaliras. Falling Star gains the spirit of the Elder Tempest, and can fly!

title: Training
description:
Falling Star flies to Castle Greyhawk.

Airell: training 

Arienh: brewing potions

Kellen: “teaching”

Mah-Kaylah: training

Mornie: training

title: Training
description:
Falling Star sails for Saltmarsh.

Airell: training 

Arienh: brewing potions

Kellen: “teaching”

Mah-Kaylah: training

Mornie: training

title: Falling Star in Saltmarsh
description: Falling Star arrives in Saltmarsh. Entire town shuts down for a week of impromptu celebrations

title: Drawmij dies
description:
Eliander Fireborn arrives in Saltmarsh, along with Kellen’s family.

Dramij cast Day Dream spell on Kellen, tells her everything he knows about Iuz and the obelisks. He gives his final orders for Mornie before he is killed by Mordenkainen and Tasha.

title: Downtime
description: MK & Kellen: downtime

title: Blind Father's retribution
description: Blind Father’s retribution: Airell, Arienh, and Mornie pay a visit to Gradsul. The less said about that, the better.

title: Party in Saltmarsh
description: IT Crew: party in Saltmahrs

title: Crazed stone giants
description: Falling Star & IT Crew depart for the Yeomanry. Ambushed by crazed stone giants and undead hill giants.

title: Baron Airell
description: IT Crew arrives in Longspear, in the Yeomanry. Airell named Baron by King Kimbertos Scotti

title: Gnome skyship rescue
description: Falling Star heads for the Jotens. Rescue the gnome skyship, then travel on to Jotendalr pass.

title: Jotendalr into Sterich
description: IT Crew wind walks through Jotendalr into Sterich.

title: Fortress of Fist of the Furncae
description: IT Crew tries to stealth across Sterich to the Altisaur, the living fortress of the Fist of the Furnace. They are spotted and race for the living fortress.

title: Battle with the Fist of the Furnace
description:
IT Crew arrives at Altisaur, just past midnight. Sneak inside the Fist of the Furnace’s citadel. 

Battle with the Fist of the Furnance; Mordenkainen, Tasha, and Reyna ambush everyone. They capture Ogrdrannal and MK.

IT Crew (minus MK) teleports with a rescued Wydhaus back to the Falling Star. Right into a battle with the undead giants in the Yeomanry.

MK has a dream with Tasha. She awakes outside Castle Greyhawk.

title: Reunion in Greyhawk
description:
IT Crew meets with Kimbertos.

MK walks back to Greyhawk, finds Hacrar, contacts IT Crew.

IT Crew tree-ports to Greyhawk. Airell finds out he’s famous.

title: Rest in Greyhawk
description: Long rest in Greyhawk. IT Crew meets with the Ruling Directorate. Mordenkainen scries on / talks to the IT Crew.

title: Zagyg's Gauntlet again
description:
Parade in Greyhawk, then teleport into Castle Greyhawk.

IT Crew navigates Zagyg’s Gauntlet in Castle Greyhawk.

title: Finding Xendros
description:
IT Crew escapes Zagyg’s Gauntlet after a spider battle. Reunites with Xendros.

Quick rest, then an expedition to the depths of Castle Greyhawk. Xendros leads them through multiple levels, sneaking past demons and Castle Greyhawk’s defenses. Reach the Earth Cradle sacrifice some of the clay people to reach Nalnaliras’s watery cave.

title: Battle at the Godtrap
description:
Early AM: Rescue of Nalnaliras’ cave. IT Crew helps Nalnaliras defeat the demon horde. Nalnaliras wants to destroy Xendros, who teleports out with MK and Kellen.

Xendros, MK, Kellen reach the Godtrap. Mordenkainen appears along the way. Xendros and Mordenkainen kill Ogdrannal, extract his shard, and trap it in the Godtrap. They perform spirit surgery on MK, separating the shard from her.

Airell, Arienh, Mornie teleport in via Kellen’s talisman. Mordenkainen & Xendros refuse to stop whatever they’re planning next. 

Battle at the Godtrap. Mordenkainen flees. Xendros is slain.

IT Crew returns to Nalnaliras, who sends them back to the top of Castle Greyhawk. Only MK, Kellen, and Arienh keep their memories. (Airell: “Why am I holding Xendros’s head?”)

title: Long rest at Greyhawk
description: IT Crew returns to Greyhawk. Takes long rest.

title: Training
description:
Airell: Training, selling, crafting

Arienh: Teaching, Brewing

Kellen: Crafting

MK: Crafting a song

Mornie: Training

title: King at Hochotch
description: Summoned by the King of Keoland. IT Crew tree-ports to Hochotch in the Duchy of Geoff. On the march against the Army of the Giants.

title: Fist of the Furnace dead and abducted
description: Battle of the Olvewater: death of the Fist of the Furnace. Kymneraph the blue dragon abducts the body.

title: Valley of the Mage
description: IT Crew travels towards to the Valley of the Mage

title: Skirmis with Grey Wardens
description: Reach the Valley of the Mage, skirmish with the Grey Wardens (elves who serve Kymneraph)

title: Blue rocks
description: Travel through the Valley of the Mage; find strange patch of rocky blue stone that grants a vision of starry black sky.

title: Escape to Ket
description: Ambush by Kymneraph. IT Crew blind teleports to Ket.

title: Dueregar
description:
IT Crew wind walks to Kilmurhak, Duergar fortress. They reach the “obelisk” which is an illusion projection of the obelisk’s area on the moon of Celene. 

Ambushed by Duergar at night. Capture, negotiate, and free the Duergar.

title: IT on Celene
description:
IT Crew trades with Duergar lord: magic items for teleportation to Celene.

IT on Celene: crosses the moonscape with Kellen briefly reconnecting to the Chained Oblivion. Fless the Mind Flayers and the Elder Brain dragon.

IT Crew negotiates with Kymneraph. Reyna refuses the terms, Arienh challenges her. Druidic ritual combat: whoever grounds Kymneraph first wins. IT Crew succeeds, Arienh becomes the High Druid of the Old Faith.

title: Fixing Celene obelisk
description: Kellen & Mornie fix the obelisk on Celene. IT Crew teleports back to Greyhawk.

title: Suspended in time
description: IT Crew suspended in time teleporting back from Celene.

title: Arienh the Great Druid
description:
IT Crew still suspended in time.

Somewhere during this time, Arienh’s mind summoned by the Druidic Rite to a conclave with the other Great Druids. Tentative agreement that she is the High Druid, if she can defeat Iuz and Rel Hjalnar.

title: Rest and Greyhawk
description: Arrive in Greyhawk. Long rest.

title: Downtime
description:
Airell: 

Arienh: Brewing

Kellen: Research, crafting

MK: 

Mornie: Training
